briefTitle: Novel Assays for Detection of Influenza Virus
officialTitle: Evaluation of Novel Molecular Assays for the Detection of Influenza Virus

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Nasopharyngeal or saliva specimens of patients in Queen Mary Hospital of Hong Kong
* Tested for influenza A virus using a commercially available assay or by the Public Health Laboratory Services Branch in Hong Kong

Exclusion Criteria:

* Insufficient specimen volume

primary.description: The result of RT-PCR can be positive or negative
primary.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 2 months

secondary.description: The cycle threshold is a surrogate for viral load
secondary.timeFrame: Through study completion, an average of 2 months
